Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillcrest Drive and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Hillcrest Drive runs to the east and west from here, extending the city's boundaries further to the east to encompass the great Allakaren Pyramid. Riverdell Way is a north-south street. About a block to the north, there is a large oak tree in the center of a small traffic circle. The Tree has been here longer than the city. Small shops line the west side of the road.
